Room.Name: Adlermann Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Adlermann Way, west of Josie's Ropery Shop.
Room.LongDescription: Josie's Ropery provides people with high quality rope and other climbing goods to get around the caverns beneath the city as well as in the mountains to the east of the city. Both are potentially very dangerous and one should always carry rope and other mountain climbing equipment if they intend to climb.
